#summary ChangeLog for Soundflower.
#labels Featured

== Version 1.4 (In Development) ==

  * Dropped support for OS 10.3.x (now supporting OS 10.4.x and OS 10.5.x).


== Version 1.3 / 1.3.1 ==

  * Merging volumes control patch by Joachim Bengtsson <joachimb@gmail.com> and some other patches made by Rogue Amoeba. This version of Soundflower has been modified to allow the use of the volume, balance, mute and gain controls.
  * Dropping support for MacOS 10.2.x because that isn't included with the developer tools anymore. 
 

== Version 1.2.1 ==

  * Initial import from Cycling '74 into Google Code.
